titles.title: To amend the Social Security Act to remove the limitation on the amount of outside income which a Social Security beneficiary may earn while receiving benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 2/3/1999--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to remove the limitation on the amount of outside income which a beneficiary may earn (earnings test) without incurring a reduction in benefits.
